name: unicloud-router-iview-admin
description: > 一个更为简洁的[后台管理系统](http://mouxangitee.gitee.io/unicloud-router-iview-admin/#/)，专为 [uni-app](https://uniapp.dcloud.io/) 量身打造

scripts.build: npm install && node unicloud-admin/runner-start.js && cd cloudfunctions-aliyun/admin && npm install && cd ../adminLogin && npm install && cd ../roles && npm install && node ../../unicloud-admin/runner-end.js
